items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks Great On
items.body: The dress is very pretty. The quality is pretty nice with the exception of the boning being just for looks as opposed to being functional. Comfortable, breathable, and flattering. Read more
items.author: Terina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap Material but did its Job
items.body: I brought this for my daughters home coming. I sewed the split in the dress closed quit a bit. She also wore a flesh colored spanx under the dress because it was more see through than expected. Which also helped hide her strapless bra in the back. She used part of the dress as a veil which was really cute. It also covered her shoulders and part of her bark.The dress itself is very low quality but did it’s job for a last minute buy. The “rods” in the dress are thin plastics which ripped out of the dress through the bottom. I end up taking them out and fixing the dress in a way that it wasn’t noticeable. Overall it is very pretty but should be priced cheaper. Read more
items.author: Virgiree

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Boning coming out
items.body: Love this dress. I look amazing in it. Only complaint is that the boning in the corset was popping out when I took it out of the bag. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: This dress is gorgeous. 5’4”, 150, ordered a medium. Fit is great, a little tight around thighs but I usually wear a large pant. It’s stretchy enough and the slit give extra wiggle room. Material is lightweight, sparkly, and glamorous. I didn’t end up keeping because I decided that the corset was a little uncomfortable and hard to sit in but for a short torso but if you’re planning to be seen it’s amazing. Read more
items.author: Tiffany

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but poor quality
items.body: Me: 5'7", 175 pounds, 36B bra, 32 inch waist Reviewing both size Large and XL Pros: Very pretty, photographs well, sparkles in the light, good length Cons: Poorly constructed, cheap scratchy fabric, no stretch or bust support, proportion don't match the image posted. I really wanted to like this dress but I just couldn't make it work. The sizing is just off. I first ordered a Large. It fit on the top but was too tight on the bottom. Then I returned it for an XL, which was too big on top but fit nicely in the bottom. You can't wear any shape wear due to the style of the dress and no amount of tape could fix the lack of support in the bust. I'm only a B cup I can only imagine the frustration if I had more books. Overall not worth the price and would not recommend Read more
items.author: Niyya

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I loved it
items.body: I loved the dress and it fitted nice and was comfortable and cute for my military ball and was a great quality. Read more
items.author: Joy Matthews

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible fit
items.body: Not fitting on top. Unsecured top hall Read more
items.author: alexandra armijo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress!!
items.body: I got so many compliments on this dress! It was absolutely stunning & well made! I ordered my normal size. Read more
items.author: Daria Willems

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Cocktail Formal Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Cocktail Formal Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Rose Red, Sky Blue, Wine Red, Pink, Blue, Dark Pink, Purple, Dark Blue, Black, Champagne, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
